reviewText:
this unintentionally hilarious kung fu movie plays like it's made for kids... and then the weird soft core porn starts up... and then it's back to a goofy kung fu movie.

of particular note is a scene where the main character is being monitored to see if his concentration can be broken when this hypnotized woman starts sexually throwing herself at him.  they don't show anything graphic, but there's PLENTY of inferred action.
